channel.title: Blogs on Annika Gandhi
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Annika Gandhi

item.title: Adventures
item.description: Adventures and Travels Something else that I wanted to highlight on this site that is a huge part of my life are the travels that I have been fortunate enough to have been on! Ever since I was a child, my parents and family friends have toted me along to the craziest of places, from Alaska, to South Africa, to Thailand. When I travel, I love to take the opportunity to enjoy nature and appreciate the culture of the people I encounter.

item.title: Regular Expressions
item.description: Introduction In SDS 348: Computational Biology and BioInformatics, we spent a portion of the end of the course learning Python. Python is a programming language that is very versatile and allows for a wide range of complexity while still being user-friendly. Whatâ€™s unique about this coding language is that it is very capable of interacting with other languages and platforms due to the usage of third party modules that can be incorporated.
